name: stockbuddy
description: A South African educational investing platform for paper trading and portfolio building

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.seed: cd backend && python seed_instruments.py && python seed_cpi.py && python seed_baskets.py && python backfill_prices.py

author: StockBuddy Team
